Templates.name: Modernity Addon 1.7.10
Templates.description: Download this first and place your downloaded Addons inside of it.

Connected Textures.name: Connected Glass
Connected Textures.description: Connects the regular Glass blocks so that they appear as one singular pane of glass. This works for full Glass blocks as well as Glass Panes.

Connected Textures.name: Connected Stained Glass
Connected Textures.description: Connects the Stained Glass blocks so that they appear as one singular pane of glass. This works for full Glass blocks as well as Glass Panes.

Connected Textures.name: Connected Tinted Glass
Connected Textures.description: Connects the Tinted Glass blocks so that they appear as one singular pane of glass.

Connected Textures.name: Connected Sugarcane
Connected Textures.description: Connects the Sugarcane blocks so that they appear as as frazzled at the top, regardless of their height.
